descriptions.overview:
2 King Beds

1292-sq-foot individually decorated room, located on the ground floor, furnished balcony/patio with ocean views


Layout - 2 bedrooms, sitting area, and tokonoma (alcove)

Relax - Private plunge pool, private spa tub, and fireplace

Internet - Free WiFi (12 hours per day, 3-device limit)

Entertainment - 42-inch LED TV with premium channels, first-run movies, video game console

Food & Drink - Kitchen with stovetop, oven, dishwasher, and cookware/dishware

Sleep - A down duvet and a pillow menu

Bathroom - 2 bathrooms, bathtub or shower, and deep soaking bathtub or rainfall showerhead

Practical - Yard, laptop workspace, and art supplies; extra futon mattress available on request

Comfort - Air conditioning, heating, and tatami floors (woven mat)

Eco-friendly - Eco-friendly toiletries, reusable coffee/tea filters, eco-friendly cleaning supplies, and compost bin

Need to Know - Housekeeping on request, bed sheets not available, no cribs (infant beds) or rollaway/extra beds available

Non-Smoking

Room is accessed via exterior corridors

Connecting/adjoining rooms can be requested, subject to availability

descriptions.overview:
1 Double Futon, 2 Large Twin Sofa Beds and 1 King Water Bed or 1 Twin Bed and 1 Twin Bunk Bed

990-sq-foot soundproofed room, furnished balcony/patio with ocean views


Layout - Dining area, sitting area, and tokonoma (alcove)

Relax - Private pool, private spa tub, and fireplace; in-room massage available

Internet - Free WiFi (12 hours per day, 3-device limit) and wired Internet access

Entertainment - 42-inch LED TV with premium channels, first-run movies, video game console

Food & Drink - Kitchen with stovetop, oven, dishwasher, and cookware/dishware

Sleep - Memory foam bed, Egyptian cotton linens, a down duvet, a pillow menu, and blackout drapes/curtains

Bathroom - Bathtub or shower, and deep soaking bathtub or a rainfall showerhead

Practical - Smartphone with limited calls and limited 5G data, washer/dryer, day bed, and free international calls; rollaway/extra beds available on request

Comfort - Air conditioning, heating, and tatami floors (woven mat)

Accessibility - Low-height counters and sink, height-adjustable showerhead, wheelchair accessible, raised toilet seat, grab bar in shower, ceiling hoist, vibrating pillow alarm, low-height view port in door, visual fire alarm, transfer shower, low-height electrical outlets in bathroom, bathroom emergency pull cord, low-height bed, wheelchair-accessible bathroom vanity, low-height door lock, closed-captioned TV, phone accessibility kit, portable shower seat, accessible bathtub, doorbell and phone notification, wheelchair-width doorways, lever door handles, braille signage, and portable bathtub seat

Eco-friendly - Eco-friendly toiletries, reusable coffee/tea filters, eco-friendly cleaning supplies, and compost bin

Need to Know - Housekeeping on request, shared accommodations, no windows

Non-Smoking

Room/bed type depends on availability at check-in and noise-free guestrooms cannot be guaranteed

Connecting/adjoining rooms can be requested, subject to availability
